SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DBConnection
Utility class responsible for establishing database connections.
DBConnectionException
Exception thrown when there is an error establishing a database connection.
InvalidAgeException
Exception thrown when a user's age is invalid during registration or update.
InvalidEmailException
Exception thrown when a user's email is considered invalid during registration or update.
RegistrationApp
Console-based application for registering users.
Response<T>
A generic class to encapsulate a response.
User
Represents a user in the system with basic personal information.
UserDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class responsible for performing database operations related to the User entity.
UserDataAccessException
Exception thrown when an error occurs while accessing or manipulating user data in the database.
UserRegistrationController
Controller class responsible for handling user registration requests.
UserRegistrationService
Service class responsible for handling business logic related to user registration.
UserRegistrationServiceException
Exception thrown when an error occurs within the user registration service layer.
WeakPasswordException
Exception thrown when a user's password does not meet the required strength criteria.
